product.title: vivaCT 80 In Vivo microCT Scanner
product.summary: vivaCT 80 is SCANCO Medical’s latest in vivo system, upgraded from vivaCT40/75 with a touch display, integrated heating, and anesthesia/respiration interface for better physiological monitoring. It delivers up to 3.9 μm resolution and a larger specimen chamber (90×500 mm). With the large-animal add-on, it can scan rabbit skulls/limbs and other larger samples. Typical subjects include mice, rats, and rabbits scanned under anesthesia or fixation, enabling longitudinal studies of tissues, organs, and metabolism.

type.label: Type
lines: Cone-beam in vivo microCT; fully shielded; no external shielding; integrated heated chamber
Comprehensive animal monitoring: temperature, onboard observation camera, heart-rate monitoring

xray_source.label: X-ray Source
xray_source.value: Sealed, air-cooled, maintenance-free; focal spot 5–7 μm (4/8 W); 30–70 kVp (presets 45/55/70 kVp)

resolution.label: Resolution
resolution.value: < 14 μm (10% MTF); 3.9–160 μm nominal isotropic (pixel size)

max_scan_size.label: Max Scan Size
max_scan_size.value: 80 × 145 mm (Ø × L); up to 450 mm via multi-scan

options.label: Large-Animal Add-on
options.value: For scanning distal limbs of larger animals such as rabbits

options.label: Filter Changer
options.value: Spectral shaping of the X-ray beam: weaker filters enhance soft-tissue contrast; stronger filters reduce beam hardening for more accurate density measurements. Options include 0.1 mm Al, 0.5 mm Al, 0.1 mm Cu; one open slot allows unfiltered scans.
